snippet.title: Amarantus: Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Roadtrip across the country. Confront a tyrant. The revolution will be messy—but the relationships will be messier. 
You won't make it through this alone.

Amarantus is out now on itch.io and Steam!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1941100/Amarantus/
itch.io: https://ub4q.itch.io/amarantus
